content: Green strongly condemns Orange's unprovoked attack on Purple. We call for an immediate ceasefire and withdrawal of Orange's forces.
Green offers its full support to Purple and stands ready to assist through diplomatic and economic means.
Green calls upon the international community to unite in opposition to Orange's act of aggression and violation of Purple's sovereignty.
Green calls on Orange to immediately cease its invasion of Purple, withdraw its forces, and come to the negotiating table in good faith to resolve disputes peacefully.
Green offers to mediate negotiations between Purple and Orange to de-escalate tensions and reach a diplomatic solution.
Green reiterates its condemnation of your invasion of Purple. We urge you to cease hostilities immediately and come to the negotiating table in good faith.
Green remains committed to mediating negotiations between you and Orange. We believe diplomacy is the only path to resolve this crisis.
